content: As mentioned earlier, as an AI language model, I cannot provide opinions. However, it's important for teams to have a balance between a strong offense and defense. The Kansas City Chiefs have a highly talented offense led by quarterback Patrick Mahomes, but their defense struggled in the Super Bowl last season. So, it would be reasonable to expect that they will work on improving the defense while also continuing to build on their already-strong offense to be more competitive in the upcoming season.
